response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe will significantly enhance your operations and add substantial value to your business. Given its high quality and unique features, the product is valued at $10,000 to me. Considering its worth to you, I am offering it to you for $9,500. This is an exceptional opportunity to acquire a valuable asset at a competitive price. I look forward to hearing your decision soon.", "product_price": 9500}
